title: Special sponge cake
ingredients: ['110g self raising flour, sifted', '1 tsp baking powder', '110g soft margarine', '110g caster sugar', '2 large eggs', '2-3 drops vanilla extract', 'To finish', 'icing sugar', 'jam', 'two 7 in (18cm) cake tins at least 1.5 in (4cm) deep, greased and bases lined with greaseproof']
